resources.string: Display or edit announcements, news and other information.

A new announcement at #VAR1# was created

Title: #VAR2#
Created by: #VAR3#
Created at: #VAR4#
Create and download database backups of Admidio tables.
The backup module can only be used in combination with a MySQL database.

Members of this role are administrators of the module and have access to everything. You can create, edit, delete data and edit categories and their rights. A role can be made an administrator by assigning it the right #VAR1_BOLD#.
All administrators of the module of the parent organization
Category name already exists in selected organization.

If option activated, the profile fields of this category will appear and can be edited in the profile view of following organizations:#VAR1#\n\n Please deactivate, if fields should only be shown in your organization.
Do you really want to delete category #VAR1_BOLD# ?
Could not delete category #VAR1_BOLD# because of #VAR2# depending entries.
This preference can only be set by the parent organization.
The visibility of the profile fields in this category can be prevented for other users, but the profile fields remain visible in their own profile and can be edited there.
This category is visible to all organizations and for this reason may only be edited by the parent organization.

Participants may add additional seats to their registration. These are then subtracted from the maximum number of participants and the remaining free seats are thereby reduced. This is e.g. useful if a participant can bring more visitors and thus requires a total number of free places.
Participants can comment on their participation. The comments can be viewed via the participant list
You signed up for the event #VAR1_BOLD# on #VAR2#.
You signed up tentative for the event #VAR1_BOLD# on #VAR2#.
You canceled the participation for the event #VAR1_BOLD# on #VAR2#.
You are able to create and edit events here. Users can register for this events.
Your registration can not be changed because the given end date for registrations has been reached or the date is in the past. Please contact a leader of the event or an administrator!

Participants can register up to this date on the event. Leaders and users with permission to edit events can still assign participants. If no date value is specified, then the start date of the event is assumed as default value.
One of the configurations given here can be set as standard configuration for the participant list on events of this organization. Participants of events are viewed with this configuration.
Here you can create and edit calendars.
Here you can create and edit rooms for events.

A new event at #VAR1# was created.

Title: #VAR2#
Date: #VAR3#
Calendar: #VAR4#

If iCal is enabled, individual events or all events within a given time period can be downloaded. Also, users will be able to subscribe to events by using their own calendar client software . (default: yes)

The list #VAR1_BOLD# is the default configuration for participants lists in this organization and can not be deleted. In the module settings, select a different configuration for the default configuration and then try to delete this configuration.
Number of iCal days in the future

Number of days in the future, to be included in an iCal download or abo. If the iCal download is started within the event module, then this setting is ignored and the filtered appointments are exported. (Default: 365)
Number of iCal days in the past

Number of days in the past, to be included in a iCal download or -Abo. If the iCal download started within the Event module, this setting is ignored and exports the filtered appointments. (Default: 30)
If enough information regarding location is provided (street, city, location), Google Maps is able to calculate route to location.

Do you want to enable event registration?\nIf event is deleted, all registered participants will be removed, too.\nWould you like to block further registrations, please reduce number of allowed participants.
Here you can create and edit categories.
Reduce number of participants for this event. Please leave field empty for unlimited participants.
You do not have the right to sign up for this appointment.
You become the organizer of the event and receive the right to add or remove further participants. In addition, you can make other people organizers.
Would you like to remove this event? All participants will be removed.
Participants can view the list of participants
Participants can send emails to all participants
You have assigned roles to the participants who are not allowed to see the dates in the selected category. Please choose one of the following roles for the participants: # VAR1_BOLD #.
In case of any further available space (e.g. additional seats, standing room), the number of additional spaces can be defined here.
Selected room is already in use at this time.
Selection box for available rooms is available. Select room and create event for selected room. (standard answer: no)

Cancellation of participants to events can be saved. The cancellations are then also displayed in the participant list. If this option is deactivated, cancellations are not saved and can not be viewed in the participant list. This option is valid from the time of the setting and can not be applied retrospectively! (Default: Yes)
If location is set, Google Maps is used to display location and route from own location. (default: yes)

Display type for events. With mode #VAR1_BOLD# all event details will be displayed within a box. With mode #VAR2_BOLD# the most important event details will be displayed in a compact list. (Default: Detailed)
The selected album can only be seen by participants of this event.
This list intends to provide an overview of files and folders not imported into the database yet. They can be added to the database. Access rights will be copied from selected folder.

These roles are administrators of the download module and have access to all folders and files. You can upload, download and configure access rights. A role can be set as administrator by assigning the permission #VAR1_BOLD#.
A new folder will be created in folder #VAR1_BOLD#.
Different data files and file types can be provided for download. This downloads can be categorized in folders with different access permission levels.

A new file was uploaded at #VAR1#

File: #VAR2#
Uploaded by: #VAR3#
Uploaded at: #VAR4#
The download module can be activated or deactivated via this setting. (Default: yes)
File #VAR1# already exists!\n\nPlease select different file name.
File type is not allowed on this server.
File name should indicate the file content. The file name affects to the listing order. E.g. file names in folders with proceedings should begin with date (yyyy-mm-tt).
The file is physically not available anymore on the server. It should be deleted from the database.
An error occurred while file #VAR1# was renamed.
Uploaded files size is greater than allowed (maximum file size: #VAR1# MB).
All files were uploaded successfully.\n\nDialog can be closed.
Not all files were uploaded successfully.
Please select all files to be uploaded into the folder #VAR1_BOLD#
Folder #VAR1# already exists!\n\nPlease select different folder name.
Folder name contains illegal characters!\n\nPlease select different folder name.
You are not allowed to display selected folder.
Folder does not exist anymore on the server. It should be deleted from the database.
An error occurred while folder #VAR1# was renamed.
Users are only allowed to upload files of smaller size than displayed here. In case of 0 upload is deactivated. (default: 3MB)

On this page you can configure who can view the folder #VAR1_BOLD#, download files or upload files. The permissions are inherited to all subfolders, and existing permissions in subfolders are overwritten. Only roles with access to the parent folder are selectable. Administrators have all permissions for the folder.

The greeting card module can be activated or deactivated via this setting. If the server does not support e-mail, the module should be disabled. This module is generally only available to registered users. (Default: yes)
The defined values indicate the maximum size of an image in the greeting card (Standard: 400 x 250 Pixel).
Your greeting card could not be sent!
Here you can define the size to which the longer side of a thumbnail images should be scaled to (Default: 250px).
Here you can define the default template (default: postcard).
Template folder could not be opened/read.

If this option is activated users that are not logged in will get a picture with a captcha code or a simple calculation. It\'s necessary to fill in the correct code or result to save the entry. The captcha is part of antispam solution in Admidio. (default: yes)
Users who are not logged in can comment on the entries in the guestbook after activating this option. The rights assignment for this function via role management is then ignored. (Default: no)

New guestbook comment at #VAR1# was created.

Text: #VAR2#
Created by: #VAR3#
Created at: #VAR4#

New guestbook entry at #VAR1# was created.

Text: #VAR2#
Created by: #VAR3#
Created at: #VAR4#
Entry saved. It will be displayed after moderation.
Your last entry was created less than #VAR1# seconds ago.

Entries of unregistered users will be checked. Too many entries within the given time intervall are not allowed. This option allows to take control over unwanted entries. If interval is set to 0, no check will be done. (default: 60 seconds)
Guests and users are able to leave greetings and comments, and can annotate other\'s entries.

Guestbook entries will be displayed after moderation. Define if moderation should be performed in case of guests or for logged in users only, or nobody\'s comments should be checked in advance. (default: Nobody)
If this option is active and a guestbook page is being loaded, comments on this page will be loaded right away. Otherwise user has to click a hyperlink in order to reveal comments. (default: no)
Display #VAR1# comment(s) of this guest book entry
An update can only be performed by an administrator. Please define the administrator credentials.
File #VAR1_BOLD# can not be found in main directory of Admidio!\n\nPlease download file again and copy it to the mentioned directory.
You have entered all the necessary data for installing Admidio.\n\nNow the database has to be created and filled with your data.
The database parameters have not been entered completely!
File #VAR1_BOLD# could not be found in folder #VAR2_BOLD#.
Enter the name of the database server here. This can be a URL or localhost if the database is running on the same machine as the webpage.
Admidio\'s database is up to date
Provide your database access information here. Table prefix can be customized if needed. Customization is necessary if multiple Admidio installations are using the same database.
Current database version: #VAR1#\n\nDatabase version after update: #VAR2#
The database name contains invalid characters!
If this field isn\'t filled, the standard port for the database is used (MySQL: 3306, PostgreSQL: 5432). If you or your webhoster need a special port, you can type it here.
The specified port is not valid. For a valid port, select between 1 and 65535 or leave it blank.
Admidio only supports MySQL and PostgreSQL.
The database user contains invalid characters!
The Admidio main directory #VAR1_BOLD# contains a config.php. It has already been moved to the adm_my_files folder. Please delete the file in the main directory.

The configuration file #VAR1_BOLD# could not be saved in folder #VAR2_BOLD#. Please assign write access to the folder (change the file attribute via FTP to 0777 or drwxrwxrwx respectively) or download the configurations file and copy it into the Admidio directory #VAR3_BOLD# by using a FTP program.\n\nAfter the file has been dropped at this location you can continue with the installation.
The necessary folder permissions for \"adm_my_files\" could not be set automatically. To continue, the rights must be manually set to \"777\".
Data from #VAR1_BOLD# does not comply with information provided in installation wizard.\n\nCheck config.php and all other information.
Enter the administrator\'s name, e-mail and access information. Log in with the administratorâ€™s credentials after installation.
Meetings can take place here. Room has to be reserved before. Beamer is free for use.

Would you like to set a link to your Facebook profile? Your Facebook login name is required. Log in to your Facebook account and display your profile. Copy URL in this field and save your profile here. Visitors of your profile are now able to open your Facebook profile directly.
Folder #VAR1_BOLD# is not writeable. Please grant write access in order to upload photos and files to download module.

Would you like to set a link to your Google+ profile? In order to do this, you will need your profile Google+ profile number. Log in to your Google+ account and display your profile. Copy URL in this field and save your profile here. Visitors of your profile are now able to open your Google+ profile directly.
Hostname is not valid. Enter a valid host name or IP address.
Enter your ICQ number here. If your status can be shown on the web (enabled in Skype), it will be displayed in your profile.
The database already contains an Admidio installation. An additional installation is not possible.
Admidio database installation and configuration is complete, system is ready for use. Please log in now by using access information of the system administrator.

Could not find the current installation. If you\'ve used Admidio 1.x update to Admidio 2.x first. Afterwards you can update the version to #VAR1#. If you are already using Admidio 2.x or higher please check the consistency of your database.
Organization #VAR1_BOLD# already exists. Please select another name.
Provided organization name is not complete!
The password does not match with the repetition.
Enter your exact Skype name here. If your status can be shown on the web (enabled in ICQ), it will be displayed in your profile.
We would appreciate a lot if you could support the development of Admidio with your donation!

Would you like to set a link to your Twitter profile? Your Twitter login name is required. Log in to your Twitter account and display your profile. Copy URL in this field and save your profile here. Visitors of your profile are now able to open your Twitter profile directly.
Updating the database is currently not possible!
Admidio database has been successfully updated to version #VAR1#.\nYou are free to log in and use Admidio again.
This is a beta version of Admidio.\n\nUsage can be risky due to possible instability and data loss. Please use as test environment only!
Save Mode on server is active. This can cause later problems when using certain functions.
Welcome to the installation of Admidio

This assistant helps you to set up the Admidio member management. All necessary data will be requested so that the system can be fully set up and you can log in as an administrator.\n\nIf you have questions or problems with the installation, please check #VAR1#our installation instructions#VAR2# or contact us at #VAR3#our support forum#VAR4#.

You have already updated the directories of Admidio with a new version. Now the database has to be updated from the current version #VAR2# to the version #VAR1#, so that Admidio can run with the new version.\n\nIf you have questions or problems with the update, please check #VAR3#our update instruction#VAR4# or contact #VAR5#our support forum#VAR6#.
Admidio #VAR1# requires at least MySQL version #VAR2#. Please try to update your MySQL database or use an #VAR3#older Admidio version#VAR4# in order to ensure compatibility.
Admidio #VAR1# requires at least PHP version #VAR2#. Please try to update your PHP version or oder use an #VAR3#older Admidio version#VAR4# in order to ensure compatibility.

Would you like to set a link to your Xing profile? Your Xing login name is required. Log in to your Xing account and display your profile. Copy URL in this field and save your profile here. Visitors of your profile are now able to open your Xing profile directly.

Activate auto forwarding for links. User will be notified by a warning message about leaving the pages of Admidio when clicking a hyperlink in link module. Clicked hyperlink will be opened after predefined time. Is redirection set to 0, hyperlink will be opened without showing the warning message (default: 10 seconds).

A new weblink at #VAR1# was created.

Link address: #VAR2#
Created by: #VAR3#
Created at: #VAR4#
Choose if selected website should be displayed in the window of Admidio or in a new window.
You are leaving the website of #VAR1_BOLD# and will be redirected automatically to #VAR3# in #VAR2# seconds.\n\nIf the automatic redirection is not working please click #VAR4#here#VAR5#!
Create and organize by categories interesting hyperlinks.

Assign any number of columns corresponding to profile fields in the table below. In addition, you can specify the default sorting and add conditions under which the respective members are to be filtered.
Permission to use configuration for all members
Would you like to mark selected configuration as default configuration for this organization?
Would you like to delete selected list configuration?
Please select name for configuration set?
The country needs to be specified as Code ISO 3166 ALPHA-3 (3 characters)

One of the configurations given here can be set as the default configuration for lists of this organization. Member lists of roles not having a list configuration are displayed with this configuration.
No default list configuration set defined by the administrator!\n\nContact system administrator for help.
Finds all users who have not filled the Road field
The display of the lists and the configuration of your own lists can be activated or deactivated by this setting. This module is generally only available to logged in users. (Default: yes)

The list configuration #VAR1_BOLD# is the default configuration for lists in this organization and can not be deleted. Choose a different configuration to the standard configuration in the module settings and try to delete this configuration afterwards.
Find all users who are not named Steve
Activate this option in order to hide details in list overview by default. Details will be displayed after user activation. (default: no)

string.name: LST_INFOBOX
string.description: A small html box that will show additional informations

resources.string: Role specific list can be displayed here. Furthermore users are able to generate and save own lists, too.
Number of members listed in the HTML view. More members can be listed by using the pagination function. This value won\'t affect print preview and export functionality (Default: 25).
The role \'administrator\' must have at least one member assigned!
Define requirements of all fields used in your new list configuration. Requirements of selected role will be limited by your own requirements.
Configuration will be defined as default configuration
For technical reasons, no more column can be added.
No member of your criteria could be found.
You are not permitted to display a list of defined roles.
Please use a valid date as condition for field #VAR1_BOLD#.
Please use a valid number as condition for field #VAR1_BOLD#.
Finds all users who have filled the Road field
Administrators are able to define default configurations for all users. Configure columns and conditions and save them by naming the configuration set.
Searching for all users older than 18 years
Searching for all users born after 1st January 1986
Searching for all users with name beginning with \'Mei\'
Searching for users with family name \'Schmitz\'
Searching for users with from Cologne or Berlin
Searching for users with phone number including 241 and ending with 54

This setting can be used to determine who can view former roles. The user must, however, also have the right to view the role himself. Leaders of a role may also view former members of their role, if they have permission to be set here. (Default: #VAR1#)
Would you like to make selected list configuration available to all users?
The e-mail module can be activated or deactivated via this setting. If the server does not support e-mail, the module should be disabled. (Default: enabled)
Users can only attach files where the file size is less than the value specified here. If there is 0 here, no attachments are possible in the e-mail module. (Default: 1MB)
E-mail attachment upload error.\nFile size is most likely to large!

When option is activated, logged in users will receive a picture with a captcha code or a simple calculation. It\'s necessary to fill in the correct code or result to send the mail. The captcha is part of antispam solution in Admidio. (default: yes)
Character encoding used in e-mails sent by Admidio. Not all e-mail clients are able to process UTF-8. Therefore ISO-8859-1 can be set here alternatively.
Please select a role as recipient of the e-mail!
Your requested copy of the message

E-Mails to roles of several members will be sent as blind copy (BCC). This way, the recipients will not be able to see who else received the message. The amount indicated in the current field is defining the number of maximum recipients of an e-mail message. The maximum number of recipients might also be restricted by the hosting provider. In case of more e-mail recipients than allowed, several e-mail messages will be generated. Should the value be set to 1, each recipient will receive directly an individual message. The number of outgoing e-mail messages within a certain time period might be restricted by the hosting provider, too. (Default: 50)

When enabled, the author of an e-mail has the opportunity to request a delivery confirmation. However, it depends on the settings of the recipients email program, whether a delivery confirmation is sent. The recipient may suppress its transmission.
E-mails can be sent to different roles like groups, courses or departments.
#VAR1# sent to the receivers: #VAR3# from #VAR2# the following E-Mail:
#VAR1# has sent following e-mail to active users of role #VAR3# on #VAR2#:
#VAR1# has sent following e-mail to former users of role #VAR3# on #VAR2#:
#VAR1# has sent following e-mail to active and former users of role #VAR3# on #VAR2#:
#VAR1# from #VAR2# has sent to you following e-mail:

Creating and sending HTML based e-mails can be enabled for registered users. A JavaScript editor will be displayed for comfortable editing, instead of the standard text field. The current option is for guests due security reasons unavailable.
Recipients need to be listed in the TO field instead of the BCC field

All recipients will be listed in the TO field if set accordingly and an email will be received by multiple person. Thus each recipient will see the name and email address of the other recipients. In addition each recipient can reply to all. (Default: deactivated)
Unlimited number of recipients can be added. Total size of all attachments together must not exceed #VAR1# MB.
This value defines the maximum amount of mail recipients. A role counts as one recipient.

E-mails to roles contain all recipients in the BCC field. The TO field is then usually filled with \"Undisclosed Recipients\". If this leads to problems, this setting can be used to fill the recipient field (TO) with the sender address or the administrator address from the system notifications. All mails to any roles will be sent in addition to these recipients. The role members are still written to the BCC field. (Default: Hidden)
Send copy of e-mail to my address
Your e-mail will be sent to all members with an e-mail address of the selected role or the selected recipients .\n\nFurther roles and recipients are available for logged in users only.

PHP\'s mail() method might be restricted by some providers and can be a reason for spam suspicion. Hence it is recommended to send mails by using an existing mail address and SMTP server. You can configure the SMTP settings below (default: PHP mail()).

Using an unknown mail address as a sender address is not allowed by some providers. In this case you can add an email address which will be used as sender address within the mail module (e.g. noreply@#VAR1#).\nIf the field remains empty the sender\'s mail address will be used (default: empty).
Name of the sender\'s mail address. This field has to be maintained if the field for sender\'s mail address is not empty (default: empty).
(Sender was logged out. Due to that sender\'s information might be incorrect.)

For logged out users an alphanumeric text will appear when captcha module is activated. The provided text has to be entered into the proper field. This should prevent abuse of the form by spammers. (default: yes)
If the SMTP server requires authentication, the username and password fields are also required. (Default: Yes)
SMTP supports different authentication methods. The current selection is used by Admidio. (Default: Login)
Specifying the port which should be used for establishing a SMTP connection. (Default: 25)
Here you can choose if and how the SMTP connection should be encrypted. (Default: no)
The username that is used in the SMTP authentication.

If possible, assign to database fields one column of a file.\n\nOn the left side you are able to find all types of database fields, on the right side you can find all columns of the selected file. Fields may be left empty when the file does not include every database field.
Select a role for all imported users.\n\nAvailable are only roles which you have user permission for.
Default time period for field history (days)

Changes in profile fields will be listed for the given period of time in days. This is the default filter option which can be changed by the user later on. For huge databases this option is used to limit the change history list. (Default: 365)
If set active, relationships between users can be maintained and displayed. (Default: yes)
First line contains the column name
Identification of existing users is made by means of first name and surname.

Import was successful..

#VAR1# new users have been created.
#VAR2# users have been edited.
#VAR3# role memberships have been assigned.
Please provide first name and surname of the new user. A database check will be performed if same user with same or similar name already exists.
A user can be changed to status former member. This will preserve all user information including role memberships for later use.
This user is not a member of organization #VAR1# yet.
Would you like to end membership of user #VAR1# in #VAR2#?
The membership of user #VAR1_BOLD# at #VAR2_BOLD# was finished successfully!
By choosing #VAR1_BOLD#, all data will be deleted and this information wont be available anymore.
You do not have permission to select role #VAR1#.\nPlease try to select another role.
Do you want to send #VAR1_BOLD# an email with the current username and a new password?
Send e-mail with username and password.
Only active members of this organization will be listed if this option is not set. Otherwise all users of the database will be listed.
Would you like to delete #VAR1_BOLD#?\n\nUser is going to be physically deleted in the database which makes later access impossible.
Display and organize all active and former members here. New users can be imported or created.
Number of users listed on each page. If there are multiple members in this group pages can be turned. (Default: 25)
The name of the entry in the menu. Here you can also enter the name of a translation string.

A menu item is always subordinate to another menu item. In the selection list, select a menu level in which the new menu item should be visible. If you want to display the menu item at the top level, select # VAR1_BOLD #.
If you specify a module here, the menu item will only be displayed if the user also has the right to see this module.

The chat module can be enabled or disabled using this setting. The module dynamically loads data from the database every 3 seconds. A maximum of 99 entries are saved. For 100 messages, the first 50 entries are deleted. (Default: Disabled)
Private messages can be enabled or disabled using this setting. (Default: enabled)
Because it is a private message, the message is only marked for deletion and is waiting for an action of the conversation partner.
There are no roles or users released to whom you can send messages.
The selected roles and users have no valid e-mail addresses. For this reason, the e-mail can`t be sent.
Private message has been send to #VAR1_BOLD#.

Private message could not be sent to #VAR1_BOLD#.

Following error has occurred:
#VAR2#
Your PM will be sent to the selected recipient.
If this option is set, then e-mails could be send to individual former members, as well as to all former members of a role. (Default: Activated)
Error - message was not sent to:
Login information has been successfully assigned.
Login information has been successfully assigned and user has been informed via e-mail.
Assigning membership and login information to selected user.
New registrations of visitors can be listed, approved or refused here.
User is not a member of organization #VAR1# but has already login information assigned.
User is not a member of organization #VAR1# and has no login information registered.
Do you want to send the user credentials (incl. password!) as a reminder?
User has no login yet.\nWould you like to assign the information of the selected registration to the user?
User already has valid login information.

Module can be deactivated or enabled for logged in users only. If module is only accessible to logged in users, it will be hidden for logged out users and web feed will be completely disabled for both user groups. (default: active)

Here you can disable the system notifications of Admidio. They can be sent, if for example a new user has registered. Registration confirmations will also be sent as system notifications. In general, this feature should not be disabled unless the server does not support e-mail delivery. The e-mail module is not affected by the deactivation. (Default: yes)

A new organization will be added to the database including its master data. The current user will be announced as administrator and can maintain the dataset. Users who log into the system need to select the respective organization.
Select layout for Admidio. All themes saved in folder adm_themes are being shown. (default: modern)

Set the time before the system automatically logs an inactive user off. A user is inactive when no page is loaded for a certain time. This configuration is being ignored when user selected #VAR1_BOLD#. (default: 20 minutes)

After activation users with outdated browsers are advised to run a browserupdate. Newer browsers guarantee a better protection against fraud, viruses, Trojans, identity theft and other threats to your privacy and security. Every new browser generation improves speed and supports more and more new web technologies, which leads to a better web experience. For this purpose, the service of https://browser-update.org/ is used.
You can choose a background image which will be used as Captcha. The font color should match with the image in order to keep it readable. (default: no image).

The background color should be in good contrast to the character color. If both line and character color are the same it is harder for scripts and bots to read the Captcha. All colors need to be specified as #VAR1#hexadecimal value#VAR2#.
This value indicates the distortion of the characters. 0 means no distortion. With a value of 3 some characters might not be readable any more. (default: 0.75)
Select font type for captcha code. (default: AHGBold.ttf)
With lines on a Captcha it is harder for scripts and bots to solve it. The more lines will be drawn the harder it will be to solve it. Unfortunately it is the same for humans. (default: 5)
The Captcha preview only considers options which already have been saved.

After activation a picture with a captcha code or a simple calculation will be displayed to new users. It\'s necessary to fill in the correct code or result to save presently edited entry. The captcha is part of anti-spam solution in Admidio. (default: yes)
Fill in your preferred subtitle for the captcha. Default font type of the current theme will be used.
Here you can define the Captcha characters which will be used. Please avoid to use characters which can easily mixed up, e.g. I and l.

Here you can define the Captcha type. The Captcha will be displayed as image. It can consist of random characters, a small math problem or two words. Further options allow to define the Captcha in detail. (default: random characters)
Captcha width in pixel. Captcha height will be calculated by proportion in regard to the width. In addition it will define the character size. (default: 215)
Select currency. Currency type will appear after all displayed amounts.
Format complies with PHP function #VAR1#. (default: d.m.Y)
All members of all roles with permission #VAR1_BOLD# receive e-mail in case of new user registration. (default: yes)

The registration by visitors of the homepage can be activated or deactivated by this setting. The profile fields that are displayed during the registration process can be configured in the profile field settings for each field. (Default: yes)

Admidio is able to provide web feeds for several modules (announcements, appointments, guestbook, photo gallery and weblinks) on the overview page for each module. Subscription is possible by browser or feed reader. (default: yes)
Define unlimited additional fields. Fields will be displayed and can be edited in user\'s profile. These fields will be available in own list, too.
Field editable only for user with permission #VAR1_BOLD#

A locked profile field can no longer be edited by the user in its own profile. It can be edited only by users who have the permission to edit all users. The Leaders of a role with the permission to edit profiles of the role members, can also edit this profile field.
Field with same name already exists in this category.
Field viewable for authorized users only (own profile & role rights)
Usually a field is visible to everybody who is allowed to view the profile. If this option is deselected only user who are allowed to edit this profile can see the field.
Field can be edited by users themselves.
Field to see for all users.
Field is mandatory. It must be filled in.
Field is not displayed during registration
Mandatory field that has to be filled in always.
Flagged (mandatory) fields always have to be filled in. This rule applies for registrations and for regular profile changes performed by users.

The entered URL later links in the profile to the content that the user has entered in this field. Optionally, even the wildcard #user_content# can be defined in the URL. This is the content that the user has entered in the field..

Example:
Url:https://www.google.de/search?q=#user_content#
field_value: Admidio
Link in profile: https://www.google.de/search?q=Admidio
This page appears when a user logged in. Path has to be provided as relative path to the Admidio main folder.\n(e.g.: adm_program/index.php)
This page is the default page of Admidio for guests. Path has to be provided as relative path to the Admidio main folder.\n(e.g.: adm_program/index.php)
Could not find a valid theme.
Define background color of the JavaScript editor here. The value can be a hexadecimal color value like #ffa500 or RGB value like (255, 185, 0).

A full-featured JavaScript editor is being used in many modules of Admidio. Events, Announcements etc. can be edited in a comfortable way by the user. In case the editor has been activated, a simple multi-lin text box is being displayed.

Users are able to define at login if login information and session should be saved on their computers. This way, they will be logged in at their visit automatically. However this can lead to unwanted access and misuse of unauthorized persons. (default: yes)

Enter the abbreviation, the official name and the email address for the organization you want to add. The email address should be a general one. It will be used as sender address when sending automatic system notifications.
No organization specific field has been created yet!
When changing the view all unsaved changes will be lost.
Notification for the administrator about new registrations

Define number of items displayed on a page. Pagination is provided if number of items exceeds defined value. Print preview and export functionality are not affected. If value is 0, all items will be listed and pagination is deactivated. (default: #VAR1#)
Manage general organization preferences or module preferences here.

Organization #VAR1_BOLD# has been added successfully. It is now selectable when logging in.\n\nIf you have a separate homepage for this organization please add it within the config.php of the separate homepage.
Define parent organization here. Parent organizations are able to create events and announcements for example which will be displayed in selected (child) organization.

Here you can specify how safe and complex passwords must be at least.
The value in brackets indicates how many attempts are required on average until the password is determined.

 No: risky password (<10^3)
 Low: Protection against throttled online attacks. (<10^6)
 Middle: protection against unrestricted online attacks.(<10^8)
 High: Moderate protection against offline hashing. (<10 ^10)
 Very high: Strong protection against offline hashing. (>= 10^10)

At registration and assigning registrations Admidio is searching for similar surnames and first names in order to avoid double entries. Deactivation results search for identical names only. (default: yes)

If the user has forgotten his/her password, he/she can automatically send a newly generated password. If this option is disabled, the user can only send a request to the administrator by e-mail, so that he can create a new password. For the password to be sent, the setting #VAR1_BOLD# must also be set. (Default: yes)
Show creator and timestamp of creation

A field is normally visible to all users. If this function is not selected, the data can only be seen by users who have the right to edit all users. In own profile, the user can see and edit the data.

If this option is enabled, former members and members of other organizations will be displayed in addition to the active members of the current organization. Otherwise only members of the current organization will be displayed. When creating new users or assigning registrations all organizations will still be checked for existing users.

In case of several organizations stored in the database, the log-in screen is able to display a selection box with all available organizations. The user is then able at log in to select another organization (other than defined in the config.php). However, the user must be a registered member of the selected organization.
This field should contain the email address of an administrator as it will be used as sender address of system notifications, e.g. for registration confirmation.

Here you can activate system notifications for new module entries. These notifications will be used for internal monitoring of Admidio. This way an administrator has the possibility to get informed about new module entries (only new entries will be considered). System notifications will be send to the following mail address #VAR1# (default: no).

Here you can justify the text of each system notification. The texts are divided into two parts (subject and content) and are identified by #subject# and #content#. The content for each section follows it.\n\nIn each mail the following wildcards can be used. They will be replaced with the corresponding content at runtime
Themes folder could not be opened/read.
Format complies with PHP function #VAR1#. (default: H:i)
This is the set time zone. If this is changed later in the config.php file of Admidio, already recorded dates and times are not adjusted to the new time zone.

In this field, you can enter the entries for the drop-down list box or the option field. For each line, an entry of the drop-down list field or the option field can be entered here.

The profile is not stored as text later, but the selected position from the list. If you change the text in a line, all users already assigned will immediately see the new text in their profile. However, if you move an entry into another line, users may see a different entry.

An option field can be displayed as icon instead of a text. The name of an icon from the theme folder (ex: ok.png) or the url of an external image (example: https://www.example.com/example.jpg) can be specified. A tooltip for the icon (eg female.png|female) can optionally be set via a vertical divider.
Activation link for the new password
Mail address of the user in regard to the mail context
System e-mail address of the organization
First name of the user from the respective e-mail context
Surname of the user from the respective e-mail context
Username of the user from the respective e-mail context
Connection to the Admidio update page could not be established. Please check your internet connection or try again later. You can also check the #VAR1# website for manual update.
A new stable version is available!
A new beta version is available!
A new stable version and a new beta version are available!
You are using a current #VAR1#version of Admidio!
Locked albums can not be viewed by visitors or members, e.g. you can lock an album as long as all images are uploading.
Album is being blocked and guests are unable to display it. Enable it by pressing key symbol in editing field.
Album has been successfully created / changed.
The size of the caption is proportional to the image size, calculated by the formula \"Image size / Devisor\". By increasing the devisor, the font size will be reduced. (Default: 40)

With this option you can define how the images will be displayed within the foto module. This can be done with a modal window which will be opened as separate browser window. The image preview will stay active in the background. If the image should be displayed in the same window the current image preview will be closed. The third option allows to show the image in a popup window which can be used in addition to the image preview. (Default: Modal window)
Allows to download single photos or complete albums as zip file. A hyperlink will be displayed for each photo or album. If option #VAR1_BOLD# is active only original photos will be downloaded.
An error occurred when creating the zip file.
A new photo album was created

A new photo album at #VAR1# was created.

Title: #VAR2#
Created by: #VAR3#
Created at: #VAR4#

Folder could not be found. In case the folder was deleted by using FTP or in case to be inaccessible, please delete the folder in Admidio.\nGuests without photo management permission can not display selected album.

Saves each photo not only with selected resolution but with original size. If option #VAR1_BOLD# is active all original photos will be downloaded. This option requires significantly more storage space and should only be selected If enough space is available.

The values specified determine the maximum size that an image may have in the display window. In a modal window or pop-up window, the window is automatically resized to fit the photo. Ideal size should follow original picture size in order to avoid rescaling. (default: 640 x 400 pixels)
Illegal page view or file could not be uploaded.\nFile size possibly exceeded allowed server defined upload size of #VAR1#B!
No photos selected to be added.
You have no permissions to perform this action.\n\nOnly logged in users with photo management permissions are enabled to manage photos.
One album can be part of another album. Please select a parent album from the selection list. If you want to display the album on the highest level then select #VAR1_BOLD#.
Photos will be added to album #VAR1_BOLD#.
Total file size of one or more photos possibly exceed allowed server defined upload size of #VAR1# MB.
Only JPG and PNG photos are allowed.
Please select the images which you want to upload to album #VAR1_BOLD#.
Not all photos were successfully uploaded.
All photos were successfully uploaded.\n\nYou can close the dialog now.
Pictures of events can be uploaded and displayed. Pictures can be organized in albums which can be interlinked.
Images can be archived or provided as download as long as there is enough space available.
Photos will be resized during upload. Pixel value defines long edge of portrait and landscape format photos. Other side remains proportional to long edge. (default: 640 pixels)

Set long edge of thumbnails. Attention: do not scale width too large in order to avoid conflict with thumbnail row and column preference. Otherwise try adjustment of thumbnail row and column preferences. (default: 160 pixels)
Text will be shown in all photos with a long edge larger than 200 pixels. (default: Â© #VAR1#)
Photos have been successfully added to album if they appear on this page.
This option defines how many thumbnail previews will be displayed on each page. If there are more images in this album a page navigation will be added automatically. (Default: 16)
Selected photo will be deleted. Are you sure?
Registration has been confirmed. The user can now log on to the system.

Define a country for which this organization mainly operates. It will be preselected when new users are created or registered. It eases the data input and can be changed by the user. (Default: Germany)
Edit profile fields in the profile
In field #VAR1_BOLD# are allowed numbers only.\nPlease update your entry.
Please define where to store profile picture (in the database or in folder adm_my_files). When a change is made, current pictures are not copied to new location. (default: database)
Changes in profil fields are recorded for each user and each field. The previous and the new value will be logged as well as the user who performed the change and the time stamp. (Default: yes)
Selected username already exists.\n\nPlease select another name.
You can create and edit profile fields which can be merged in categories.
The role management contains no default role for new users. Please contact an administrator who can edit this setting.
No roles were found. Possibly you do not have the rights to see certain roles.

Password must have at least 8 characters including numbers, letters and special characters.\n\nThe strength of your selected password will be displayed in color using a bar. The minimum required strength is indicated by the arrow in the bar.
Password must have at least 8 characters.
Original and retyped passwords are different.
The password is not secure enough.
Size of uploaded photo exceeds server allowed file size of #VAR1# B.
Only JPG and PNG formated photos are allowed.
Uploaded picture\'s size exceeds server allowed resolution of #VAR1# megapixels.
New profile picture has been successfully saved.
You should even be seen in the photo.
Photo has to be saved as JPG or PNG.
Server is able to handle photos with a maximum size of #VAR1# megapixels.
Uploaded files must not be greater than #VAR1# MB.
Data can not be saved.\nNo role was assigned to user.
A box will be shown with all roles of the user in the current organization. Membership start and end date will be displayed. (default: yes)
When address information is complete, a link to Google Maps is being created in order to show location map and route from own location to user\'s location. (default: yes)
A box will be shown with all roles of the user in the current organization. Permissions and registration date will be displayed. (default: yes)
When user is member in roles of another organization, a box will be displayed showing all roles and the registration date. (default: yes)
Press button #VAR1_BOLD# in order to select photo files on harddrive for upload.
You will be able to login with this username.\n\nThis name must be well-defined. If selected name is not available anymore, please try to use combinations like Andi78 or SteveT.

Only roles of other organizations which are visible to all registered users are displayed. If you are a member of this organization, you will also be shown the roles that you may see with your rights within the organization.
Would you like to delete the selected photo?

If set, then a user can edit the profile of another user to which he is related to. For an asymmetric relationship, the right is assigned separately for each relationship, and for a symmetric relationship, both users can edit the other profile, and in case of a unidirectional relationship, only the user with the relationship stored can edit the other profile.
Edit user profile of this relationship
No relationship types exists. Relationship types can be created in the user management.
Do you want to remove this type of relationship #VAR1_BOLD#? Warning: This will delete all existing relationships of this type.

An asymmetrical relationship is e.g. used for parent / child while symmetrical relations e.g. can be used for siblings. These are always bidirectional, however, unidirectional relations only mark in one direction.
You can not delete role #VAR1_BOLD#. At least one role requires the #VAR2_BOLD# setting.
You can not delete the system role #VAR1_BOLD#.
You can not delete the role #VAR1_BOLD#.

In case there is a member list for this role to be displayed and no list configuration is specified, the list is displayed in the system-wide selected standard list configuration. Using this field for an individual role, a different configuration list can be selected which is displayed when no configuration list is preset.

If a new user is created or a new registration is accepted, then this role is automatically assigned to the new user. When the creator has the right to assign roles, all role mappings are displayed and can be changed accordingly.

If you disable role #VAR1_BOLD#, the role can no longer be used and assigned to objects. Likewise, all rights of this role are no longer effective. However, the role with its setting and all member mappings remains and can be reactivated at a later date.
If you re-activate the role #VAR1_BOLD#, the role members are assigned again with permissions and the role is selectable in all lists.\n\nDo you want to re-activate the roles?
Head of this role have no special rights. They will be highlighted in list views only.
Head of this role can edit profile data of all role members.
Head of this role can add new role members or remove existing members.

Roles members can be appointed as managers of a role and get optional extended rights.\nThey can get the right to manipulate profile data of all roles members and / or the right to add or remove members of the role. Having both rights, however, they would be able to edit information of all members.
Would you like to move back role #VAR1_BOLD# to current roles?
Would you like to end membership in role #VAR1_BOLD#?
Members of this role are administrators of the module and have access to everything. You can create, edit, delete data and edit categories and their rights.
You can not remove the setting #VAR1_BOLD#, because at least one role must be stored as the default assignment.
View membership lists of all roles
Users of this role have access to the role management and can create new roles, manage and assign roles to other users.
Roles having this permission can manage the rights for the download module. This includes who can see folders and can upload files.
Roles having this permission can edit the data of other users (except passwords).\n In addition they have access to the user administration and can add/delete users.
This setting controls who has the right to send e-mails to this role via the e-mail module. However, the role right #VAR1_BOLD# is still above this setting.
Define which user should be able to see several lists and certain user profiles of members of the current role. Role permission #VAR1_BOLD# is parent configuration is the current permission level.
Roles based on certain groups, courses and departments can be managed here. Role permissions can be defined here, too.
Are you sure you want to delete the role #VAR1_BOLD#?\n\nAll memberships will also be removed permanently.

A member of a dependent role will become automatically a member of #VAR1#!\n\nWhen this dependency is set all existing members of the dependent role will become a member of #VAR1#. When a dependency is going to be deleted, memberships will remain the same!
Role with same name already exists in this category.
Saving this settings might cause loosing of role configured dependencies.
All guests are allowed to send e-mails to current role.
Logged in users are allowed to send e-mails to current role.
Role members of this role only are allowed to send e-mails to current role.
Logged in users are able to display membership lists of the current role.
Members of the current role only are allowed to display the membership list.
The online management system for associations, groups and organizations

The selected category is shared for all organizations.\nThe current object (event, announcement, profile field, weblink, etc.) will be visible not only in this organization but also in all the following organizations: #VAR1#.
The result of the calculation is not correct.

The calculation is part of a captcha. A captcha is used for spam prevention. The calculation is used to detect if a user or a script (or spambot) filled in the form.\nPlease fill in the result of the calculation in the form.

The authentication code is part of a captcha. A captcha is used for spam detection. The picture is used to detect if a user or a script (or spambot) filled the form.\nPlease fill the result of the authentication code into the form.
Checkbox status is saved automatically after marking.
Show notice of use of cookies

Visitors and registered users receive a notice when using the website for the first time that this site uses cookies. This note must be confirmed once by the user, after that the user no longer receives any information on this device and browser.
This website uses cookies to ensure that you get the best experience on our website. By using this website you agree that we use cookies.
Log-in error! Your browser does not accept cookies!\n\nFor successful log-in, please, configure your browser to accept cookies from #VAR1_BOLD#.
If the new user is not listed among the users found, you can create it.

string.name: SYS_CURRENT_USER_NO_EMAIL
string.description: Var1 und Var2 erzeugen den Profil-Link

resources.string: No valid e-mail address has been provided!\n\nPlease provide an e-mail address in your #VAR1#profile#VAR1#.
If this option is enabled, the data (Events, announcements, weblinks ...) in this category will also appear on the websites of the following organizations:\n#VAR1_BOLD#

The connection to the database failed!

The following error occurred:
#VAR1#.

No connection to the database could be created!

Please check the access data in the file config.php in the folder adm_my_files. If the file is still from another installation, please remove the config.php from the folder, because a new file will be created via the installation wizard. After that you can continue the installation.

The following error occurred: 
#VAR1#.

string.name: SYS_DATABASE_VERSION_INVALID
string.description: Var3 and Var4 create link to update

resources.string: The database version #VAR1# is lower than the version of the Admidio scripts #VAR2#.\n\nPlease perform #VAR3# database update to version #VAR4#.
End date is before start date.
Invalid date in field #VAR1_BOLD#.\n\nDate has to comply with this formatting: #VAR2_BOLD#.
Would you like to delete entry #VAR1_BOLD#?
There is no other category in this area. For this reason, the category can not be deleted.
You can not delete system categories.

The usage of the storage space could not be determined.

Error message:
#VAR1#
E-mail address in field #VAR1_BOLD# includes invalid characters or is incomplete.

The email could not be sent to #VAR1_BOLD#.

The following error occurred:
#VAR2#
Field #VAR1_BOLD# contains illegal characters.\n\nAllowed characters are letters from \'a\' to \'z\' and \'A\' to \'Z\', numbers from 0 to 9 and special characters like .-_+@ .
Selected file does not exist on the server.
Size of uploaded file exceeds server defined maximum file size of #VAR1# MB.
The selected file name #VAR1_BOLD# contains invalid characters.\n\nOnly alphabetic characters, umlauts, numbers from 0-9 and special characters $!?._+-()& are allowed.

string.name: SYS_FILESYSTEM_VERSION_INVALID
string.description: Var3 and Var4 create link to download

resources.string: The database version #VAR1# is higher than the version of the Admidio scripts #VAR2#.\n\nPlease update your Admidio files on the server #VAR3# by using a later version of Admidio#VAR4#.

string.name: SYS_FOLDER_NOT_CREATED
string.description: Var2 und Var3 erzeugen den MailTo-Link

resources.string: Folder #VAR1_BOLD# cannot be created.\n\nPlease ask an #VAR2#administrator#VAR3# for help to check write permissions of the parent folder.

string.name: SYS_FOLDER_WRITE_ACCESS
string.description: Var2 und Var3 erzeugen den MailTo-Link

resources.string: Folder #VAR1_BOLD# cannot be created with required write permissions.\n\nPlease ask an #VAR2#administrator#VAR3# for help in order to check write permissions (by using FTP changing file attributes to 0777 or drwxrwxrwx).
An unexpected error occurred while generating a random number.\nError Code: #VAR1#\nError Message: #VAR2#
The program can not generate random numbers.\nError Code: #VAR1#\nError Message: #VAR2#
The program expects a string with at least 2 different characters.
iCal has been disabled by the system administrator.

The internal name is used to uniquely access this data object. This is not relevant for program use. In development, however, this name must always be used to identify the field, e.g. to address with getValue (). The internal name is automatically filled when creating a data record.
You have tried to login too many times recently using a wrong password.\nFor security reasons your account has been locked for 15 minutes.
Your account has not been activated yet.\n\nYou will be informed as soon as access is possible.
Your login credentials were correct but the update process is only activated for administrators of the organization #VAR1_BOLD#.
Your login credentials were correct but you are not an active member of this organization #VAR1_BOLD#.
The given username and/or password is incorrect.
You already signed in. Therefore you must already have the correct password!
The new password has been sent to the e-mail address #VAR1_BOLD#!
The new password has been sent to the user #VAR1_BOLD#!
E-mail address #VAR1_BOLD# has been assigned to multiple registrations. A unique user registration could not be identified.
Requested entry does not exist in the database.
You do not have the required permission to perform this action.
You are not a member of organization #VAR1#

If you have forgotten your password, the system can create a new password and send it to your email address. Please type in, your user name or e-mail address used for registration in the system. The new password will be sent immediately to the registred e-mail address.
Login failed due to incorrect password.\n\nPlease check your password and try again.
The phone number in the field #VAR1_BOLD# has invalid characters.\n\nAllowed are only numbers 0-9 and the special characters +-/ ().
PHP version is no longer officially supported by PHP (End of Life). (#VAR1#)
Admidio/PHP can not generate secure pseudo-random numbers! Please contact the Admidio team with the following information:
The new password has already been activated or the activation code is incorrect!
The specified redirect URL is not valid.
Your data has been saved.\n\nLogin possible after confirmation. You will be informed by e-mail about successful confirmation.
It was not possible to save the change. Maximum number of role members in role #VAR1_BOLD# will exceed predefined limit.
Web feed has been disabled by the system administrator.
Might cause problems with file uploads
Server settings do not allow files uploads.
At least one user with similar name (#VAR1_BOLD# ) was found in the database.

#subject# Your requested password for #organization_short_name# website
#content# Hello #user_first_name#,

you requested a new password!

Your log in details are:
Username: #user_login_name#
Password: #variable1#

To activate your password, please follow this link:

#variable2#

The password was generated automatically,
therefore you should log in at #organization_homepage# to change it under "My profile".

Greetings,
The administrators

#subject# Login details for #organization_homepage#
#content# Hello #user_first_name#,

your new login details for the #organization_long_name# website:
Username: #user_login_name#
Password: #variable1#

The password was generated automatically,
therefore you should log in at #organization_homepage# to change it under "My profile".

Cheers,
The administrators

#subject# in registration at #organization_long_name# rejected.
#content#Hello #user_first_name# your application at #organization_homepage# was rejected.

Registrations are accepted in general by our users. If you are a member and your registration was still rejected, it may be because you were not identified as member.
To clarify the reasons for the rejection please contact the administrator #administrator_email# from #organization_homepage#.

Regards,
The administrators

#subject# Registration on #organization_long_name# website approved
#content# Hello #user_first_name#,

your registration on #organization_homepage# is approved.

Now you may log in with your username: #user_login_name#
and your password.

In case of any questions, please don't hesitate to contact the administrator via email to #administrator_email# .

Cheers,
The administrators

#subject# New registration at #organization_long_name# website
#content# A new user registered himself on #organization_homepage#.

Surname: #user_last_name#
First Name: #user_first_name#
E-Mail: #user_email#


This message was generated automatically.
Time error in field #VAR1_BOLD#.\n\nTime format value must look like this:: #VAR2_BOLD#.
The file name can not be named \"Submit\".
The URL in the field #VAR1_BOLD# contains invalid characters.\n\nOnly alphabetic characters, umlauts, numbers 0-9 and special characters .-+_:/#?= are allowed.
No user could be found with this ID!
User #VAR1_BOLD# has no valid e-mail address in personal information!
#VAR1# visible only to logged in users
